title: ShopSmart Analyzer
description: A cutting-edge catalog quality assessment tool that evaluates product listings using over 7 key parameters, offering actionable insights for e-commerce vendors.

title: SparkSpace
description: A real-time collaborative workspace platform with messaging, reactions, subscription payments via Razorpay, and media uploads powered by AWS S3.

title: CryptoTracker
description: A crypto tracker app that fetches real-time data for 7,500+ coins using CoinGecko API. Optimized for performance using Zustand and React Query.

title: Sheet Collab
description: Real-time collaboration platform with instant updates, version control, and support for advanced calculations including row, cell, and mathematical operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
